function.name: send_csv
function.description: SendCSV Tool: Generates a CSV file with the provided data and sends it as an email to the user.

subject.description: The subject of the email. Descriptive and human friendly name that describes the content of the data. Max length: 120 characters.

data.description: The data to send in the email. The data should be in the format of an array of hashes like: [{key1: '<value1>', key2: '<value2>'}, {key1: '<value1>', key2: '<value2>'}, ...]
